revised_title: On the Production of Artificial Cold by Muriate of Lime
tldr: The author investigates the production of artificial cold using muriate of lime and discovers that it can produce a temperature of -40 degrees Celsius when mixed with snow. The experiments also reveal that the muriate of lime can be reused multiple times by evaporating and crystallizing it. The author also explores the effects of combining muriate of lime with other salts, but finds no significant improvement in the cold production.
